name: Snowed IN
description:
Military officer Sigma gets tasked with supervising the final exam of a promising cadet. Seems easy enough.
The problem? The two of them are polar opposites.
One is a cyborg, the other is all natural. One is jaded, the other is still amazed at life.

But don't opposites attract each other?





  • Short and lewd: 4 erotic scenes in the 1h estimated play time
  • Multiple choices and endings
  • Plot-related minigame
  • Beautiful sprites and fully uncensored CGs illustrated by Julioalqae!
  • Partial voice acting: giggles, sighs, gasps... and moans!
  • Achievements!
